about_the_game:
In the world of Web Host Simulator, you'll establish a web hosting company from your small apartment, aiming to become the leading hosting service provider. But success requires more than attracting customers; you must also handle challenges like cyberattacks, outages and others events!

Key Features

  • Diverse game modes: Career, sandbox and training;
  • Different types of product for sale: Hosting reseller, Shared hosting, VPS, Cloud, Dedicated server and more;
  • Different types of equipment: Routers, firewalls, servers, UPS and more;
  • Random events: Face power outages, hacker attacks and more;
  • Hardware assembly: Assemble and optimize equipment;
  • Immersive environments: Navigate graphical and command-line operating systems;
  • Internet in-game: Explore immersive websites;
  • Realistic cables: Manage cables with real-time physics simulation;
  • Upcoming features: Stay tuned for updates during development.

Ready to turn your apartment into a hosting provider empire?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: +2 GHZ dual core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD RX 460
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
  • Processor: +3 GHZ dual core processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11
  • Processor: Intel and Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630 or Apple Silicon
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on a Mac Mini M1 2021

short_description: In Web Host Simulator, you'll start your web hosting company in your small apartment, aiming to become the world's leading provider. But to do so, you must win clients, outperform competitors, and deal with cyber threats, disruptions, and challenges from an ISP!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Russian, Bulgarian, Swedish, Turkish, Norwegian
